projectLinks.title: Excel Society Website Redesign
projectLinks.description: A redesign of Excel Society’s website focused on improving usability, accessibility, and improved staff content management.

projectLinks.title: MacEwan Room Booking Redesign
projectLinks.description: A mobile redesign of MacEwan’s room booking system focused on improving usability, accessibility, and speed for students managing study and group sessions.

projectLinks.title: Skyrim Quest Log Redesign
projectLinks.description: A UX/UI redesign of Skyrim's quest log, transforming it into an intuitive and immersive journal with improved clarity, filtering, and usability for modern players.

projectLinks.title: Designing an AR App for Telus World of Science
projectLinks.description: A mobile AR app created to enhance navigation, accessibility, and engagement for visitors at Telus World of Science Edmonton.

projectLinks.title: Immersive VR for Geospatial Visualization
projectLinks.type: UX & UI Design | VR Unity Development
projectLinks.description: A VR tool designed to help urban planners and analysts explore geospatial data layers in 3D using the Meta Quest headset.
